items.sizeInformation: Height: 45cm, Width: 32cm, Length: 15cm, Shoulder Strap Length: 42~83cm

items.longDescription:
GEN HOSHINO

This is the first collaboration between UT and Gen Hoshino, who is a talented musician, actor, and writer. With motifs of his own music, hand-drawn illustrations, photographs, and the mysterious and popular character "Akira Nise" design, you can feel his creativity throughout this collection.

Gen Hoshino
Born in 1981 in Saitama, Japan, Gen Hoshino is a genre-crossing musician, actor, and author whose career as a solo artist began with the 2010 release of his first solo album “Baka no Uta.” His ability to excel in a wide range of fields is highly touted both in and outside Japan.

Akira Nise
The birthdate, birthplace, and even the gender of this songwriter, author, and part-timer are unknown. What is known is Akira Nise is Gen Hoshino’s friend, confidant, and frequent collaborator in works and shows. Akira Nise’s most famous song is “Real”.

© 2021 Amuse lnc. All rights reserved.
items.name: Gen Hoshino Canvas Tote Bag
items.shortDescription: Gen Hoshino is an artist of many talents. This new and special UT collection is filled with his creativity.
items.sizeInformation: Height: 36.5cm x Width: 38cm x depth:15cm, Handle Length: 54cm
